item.title: Wunderground
item.description: An android mobile app for alerting sleepy passengers of their impending stop. Built after I grew tired of falling asleep and missing my stop on the way home from a long day (excuse the pun :D). The app monitors WiFi access-points available on London underground station platforms, recording a user’s progress towards their target location, i.e., home. As they approach their station the phone alerts the user in the hope they will wake up and realise.
